short_summary: Lower Level Outlet, Conduit Lining Repair
full_summary:
# Tender Notice - Low Level Outlet Conduit Lining Repair at Roughbark Creek Dam

## Solicitation Notice

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada intends to contract a service provider to conduct repair work on the conduit lining of the low level outlet at Roughbark Creek Dam, located in southeastern Saskatchewan.

## Contract Details

* Solicitation Number: 4547-928-7R9-0-C4
* Amendment Number: 5
* Publication Date: May 08, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: May 23, 2023, at 16:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Cancelled

## Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: Construction (CNST)
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Saskatchewen. 
* Regions of Delivery: Saskatchewen.

## Contract Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada seeks a contractor to conduct repair work on the conduit lining of the low level outlet at Roughbark Creek Dam. The work includes, but is not limited to:

* Inspection of the existing outlet pipe
* Evaluation and recommendation for the conduit lining
* Extension of the existing outlet pipe
* Installation of a new pipe lining
* Installation of riprap and embankment fill
* Cleaning and inspection of the gate well, gate, and gate hardware
* Revegetation and restoration of the site

## Tender Submission

The tender process is a two-stage process. Bidders are required to submit a Phase One bid, which includes qualifications and experience. Following evaluation, successful bidders will be invited to submit a Phase Two bid, which includes pricing.

Electronic submissions only will be accepted. The tender submission must be received by the tender closing date and time. The bid should include the solicitation number, name of the contracting authority, bidder's name and contact information, and the return address.

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact Melissa Smith, at (306) 515-4796 or melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca. Documents may be found online at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5312/itt-
